This November our very own Sinfonia are presenting a Scandinavian concert extravaganza including Neilsen's Helios Overture</em> and Sibelius's wondrous Symphony No. 3</em>.</p>

With fresh new conductor Michael Graham at the conductor's stand this is a concert not to be missed!</p>
